Field Detail

BUCK_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY

public static final String BUCK_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY
The directory where Buck will generate its files.

Ultimately, the fields ANDROID_GEN_DIR, GEN_DIR, BIN_DIR, ANNOTATION_DIR will be hardcoded subdirectories of this directory.

ANDROID_GEN_DIR

public static final String ANDROID_GEN_DIR
This directory is analogous to the gen/ directory Ant would produce when building an Android application. It contains files such as R.java, BuildConfig.java, and Manifest.java. It is distinct from the "gen/" directory so that Buck can be used alongside Ant, if desired.

GEN_DIR

public static final String GEN_DIR

BIN_DIR

public static final String BIN_DIR

ANNOTATION_DIR

public static final String ANNOTATION_DIR

BUILD_RULES_FILE_NAME

public static final String BUILD_RULES_FILE_NAME
This variable is package-private because conceptually, only parsing logic should be concerned with the files that define build rules. Note that if the value of this variable changes, the BUILD_RULES_FILE_NAME constant in buck.py must be updated, as well.
